description:
This is a step by step video course to help you build a unique weight loss plan. It has been used by over 50,000 members on my official website, with many inspiring success stories over the years.

Yes it is called "How to Lose 5kg in 5 Weeks", but you can use the methodology for any weight loss target. This video focuses on education to help you understand:

  • How to set realistic weight loss goals
  • How to build a unique diet plan based on your own personal needs, requirements and goals.
  • How exercise is great but not a must when it comes to weight loss

Taking this course will take just 2-3hrs of your precious time. After which, you will have a clear understanding on how to build a sustainable weight loss plan based on your unique goal and lifestyle - no matter where you live.

Please note that this is a Lifetime course. You will receive upcoming videos and eBooks for a lifetime.
title: How to lose 5kg in 5 Weeks
